amendment.description: Amendment directs the State Department to submit to Congress a report on the 1059 and 1244 Special Immigrant Visa Programs for certain Iraqis and Afghanis who work for, or on behalf of, the U.S. Government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part C of House Report 111-143 to direct the State Department to submit to Congress a report on the 1059 and 1244 Special Immigrant Visa Programs for certain Iraqis and Afghanis who work for, or on behalf of, the U.S. Government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
